import * as React from 'react' import { Component } from 'react' import styles from './../styles/episodeSelect.module.css' import Image from './basicComponents/image' import { IEpisode } from './../Interfaceses/IEpisode' export interface EpisodeSelectProps { episodes: Array onSelect(episode: IEpisode): void numberToSkip: number } export interface EpisodeSelectState { firstShowingElement: number lastShowingElement: number elementLengthInPersent: number } class EpisodeSelect extends React.Component< EpisodeSelectProps, EpisodeSelectState > { constructor(props: any) { super(props) this.state.stepInput = React.createRef() } componentDidMount() { const { current } = this.ref console.log(`${current.offsetWidth}, ${current.offsetHeight}`) } state: EpisodeSelectState = { firstShowingElement: 1, lastShowingElement: this.props.numberToSkip, } render() { return (
